<!-- autogenerated don't modify -->

# @paprika/listbox-tags - 0.0.1

## Description

ListBoxTags behave as a ListBox with the difference that the selected option stack on pills next to an search input

## Installation

```
yarn add @paprika/listbox-tags
```

or with npm:

```
npm install @paprika/listbox-tags
```

## Props

### ListBoxTags

| Prop     | Type   | required | default | Description |
| -------- | ------ | -------- | ------- | ----------- |
| children | custom | false    | -       |             |
